problem: If a train travels at a speed of 40 miles per hour, how many hours will it take to travel 280 miles?
A store is offering a 15% discount on all items. If an item originally costs $80, what is the discounted price?
If 3 workers can complete a task in 12 hours, how many hours would it take 6 workers to complete the same task?
A car travels 150 miles in 3 hours. At this rate, how many miles will it travel in 5 hours?
If the ratio of boys to girls in a class is 3:5, and there are 24 boys, how many students are in the class?
A rectangular garden has a length of 12 meters and a width of 8 meters. What is the area of the garden in square meters?
If a shirt costs $25 and is on sale for 20% off, what is the sale price?
If 4 pencils cost $1.20, how much would 10 pencils cost?
A recipe calls for 2.5 cups of flour to make 2 dozen cookies. How many cups of flour are needed to make 5 dozen cookies?
If a box contains 5 red marbles, 3 blue marbles, and 7 green marbles, what is the probability of randomly selecting a blue marble?
